website.about: I'm Alan Joshua, a passionate web developer with 1 year of experience crafting user-friendly web experiences. I'm proficient in modern technologies like React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Flask, and I enjoy working with APIs to integrate powerful functionality. I believe in building responsive websites that are not only visually appealing but also intuitive and accessible. I'm always eager to learn new things and collaborate on challenging projects. Let's bring your web ideas to life!

project.heading: Edutech
project.subheading: A learning website for college students
